Package edu.cnm.deepdive.green_print.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CC_API
    CC_API implementation of the CoolClimate API.
    ConsumptionWithActivities  
    DisplayHistoryFragment  
    HistoryFragment  
    HomeFragment
    HomeFragment displays Logo and welcome on startup.
    LinkedFragment  
    MainActivity
    MainActivity activates the side drawer menu NavigationView to show one of 2 main Fragment instances.
    ScoreFragment
    ScoreFragment displays the user carbon footprint score.
    SurveyFragment
    SurveyFragment implements user input to API when submit button is clicked.
    UpdateFragment
    UpdateFragment gives the user checkbox options with activities which lower the users carbon footprint on completion.
